beer.beer_description:
Birra Moretti is a quality beer made in the traditional way. It is the result of a production process that has remained almost unchanged since 1859.
 The best raw materials are used to make Birra Moretti, as well as a special blend of high quality hops that gives it a unique taste and fragrance, enhancing its perfectly balanced bitter taste.

It is a bottom fermented beer with a golden colour. This colouring is a result of the type of malt used in brewing.
 Its alcohol content is 4.6% alcohol by volume. It is not a strong beer and is therefore perfect for drinking at lunch, at dinner or for evenings out with friends.

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 195 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 40!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 295 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 60!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 60 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 13!
